org.openimaj.math.geometry.shape

Class TriangulatedPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.math.geometry.shape.PointList
      • org.openimaj.math.geometry.shape.Polygon
        • org.openimaj.math.geometry.shape.TriangulatedPolygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Iterable<Point2d>, GeometricObject, Shape

    public class TriangulatedPolygon
extends Polygon
    A polygon that has been broken into triangles.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Detail

      • TriangulatedPolygon

        public TriangulatedPolygon(Polygon p)
        Construct a TriangulatedPolygon with a polygon. Triangulation is performed with a DelaunayTriangulator.
        Parameters:
        p - The polygon.

      • TriangulatedPolygon

        public TriangulatedPolygon(Shape shape)
        Construct a TriangulatedPolygon with a shape. Triangulation is performed with a DelaunayTriangulator.
        Parameters:
        shape - The shape.
